channel.title: keyboards on Jesstern
channel.description: Recent content in keyboards on Jesstern

item.title: How to type the Control (^), Option (⌥), and Command (⌘) keys on macOS
item.description: Here’s how you can type the Control (^), Option (⌥), and Command (⌘) keys on macOS. Control (^) key – type Shift-6 Option (⌥) key – press Control-Command-Space and search for “option” Command (⌘) key – press Control-Command-Space and search for “place of interest”

item.title: Shortcut key to insert emoji and symbols on macOS
item.description: Just press Control-Command-Space on your keyword to open up the Emoji & Symbols window. Select or search for an emoji. Click the small icon to the right of the search bar to bring up the character viewer to select more symbols.

item.title: Which mechanical keyboard switch should I choose?
item.description: Choosing between the different types of mechanical keyboard switches?
